title: Tests for cyrillic texts - Brill vs Times New Roman
content:
A tex input file to use with XeLaTeX and the corresponding pdf output in order to compare Brill with Times New Roman on a text of width 90mm. Files meant for the thread [http://www.typophile.com/node/103271](http://web.archive.org/web/20150414120603/http:/www.typophile.com/node/103271 "http://www.typophile.com/node/103271")

The input text is utf8 encoded and should normally have extension .tex.

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [russian\_90mm.txt](http://web.archive.org/web/20150414120603/http:/typophile.com/files/russian_90mm.txt) | 1.95 KB |
| [russian\_90mm.pdf](http://web.archive.org/web/20150414120603/http:/typophile.com/files/russian_90mm.pdf) | 36.62 KB |
author: Michel Boyer
